TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceProvider

Docs.summary: Defines the interface a class must implement to act as a resource provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 资源提供程序帮助的资源文件中的值检索。 形式的表达式时`<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>`遇到分析过程中页，该资源提供程序返回资源的本地化的值。 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory>类创建的实例<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider>用于检索值的对象。
## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。 资源提供程序工厂创建的实现的类实例<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider>。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetObject (string resourceKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(string resourceKey, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function GetObject (resourceKey As String, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetObject(System::String ^ resourceKey, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member GetObject : string * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

Docs.param: The key identifying a particular resource.
The culture identifying a localized value for the resource.
Docs.summary: Returns a resource object for the key and culture.
Docs.returns: An that contains the resource value for the and .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在实现时，<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider.GetObject%2A>方法返回基于当前区域性的资源键的本地化的值。 实现类无法检索<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性的值如果`culture`参数不传递中。
## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。 资源提供程序工厂创建的自定义的资源提供程序实现的实例<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider>。 资源提供程序包括自定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider.GetObject%2A>方法。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceReader As IResourceReader
public: property System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ ResourceReader { System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets an object to read resource values from a source.
Docs.value: 与当前的资源提供程序关联。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader>对象从源中读取顺序的名称/值对。 <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>和<xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader>类提供默认<xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader>分别接口从.resources 和.resx 文件进行读取的实现。 其他实现<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider>接口无法从任何源读取包含资源的值。
## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。 资源提供程序工厂创建的自定义的资源提供程序实现的实例<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider>。 资源提供程序包括自定义<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider.ResourceReader%2A>属性。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
